events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but decided to return it because it doesn't fit well and I want my money back.
The system has categorised this customer's case as a refund request based on keywords indicating a return.
An available customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request to ensure timely assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you would like to initiate a return and get a refund for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return to process your refund more quickly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is too small despite checking the size chart before buying.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket, and once received, we will refund the full amount.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and for making the return process easy.
The return label has been sent to your email address. Please use it to ship back the jacket and expect your refund shortly after.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday. Thanks a lot for your help throughout this process!
We are happy to hear that the refund was successful. Closing this case now, and please contact us if you need further assistance.
